title: FS:  T206 Cy Young Portrait PSA4 **SOLD**
author: Edwolf1963

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 Cy Young Portrait PSA4 **SOLD**
posts.post_content:
FS:  T206 Cy Young Portrait, PSA4.  **SOLD**  PayPal (payment owed), check or MO.  PM, email or post.  Thanks!

Note:  for what its worth, question came in on if creased up top - no, interesting - that mark does not appear to go to the border!  Not typical of creasing or wrinkle.  Under loop, looks like color cracking, dryness/age perhaps in that emerald green background .. or possibly card sat on uneven surface at one point?
